input.description:
adapter name [Optional] The name of the adapter use to handle the request.
Default value: VMwareInfrastructure

items The items XML used to find one or more items within Virtual Infrastructure Client.
Value takes the form:
<items> <item> <parameters> .......... </parameters> </item> </items>

item type The item type that makes the judgement on what wrapper must be executed.
Valid values: Retrieve_VM_Configuration Retrieve_VM_CPU_Usage Retrieve_VM_Disk_Usage Retrieve_VM_Memory_Usage Retrieve_VM_Network_Usage Retrieve_VM_Status Retrieve_Task_Status Retrieve_VM_Alarm_List Retrieve_Host_Usage Retrieve_Cluster_Configuration Retrieve_Cluster_Datastore_Configuration Retrieve_Port_Group_Configuration Retrieve_Virtual_NIC_Configuration Retrieve_Virtual_Switch_Configuration Retrieve_Host_Configuration Retrieve_Host_Datastore_Configuration Retrieve_Host_Network_Configuration Retrieve_CD_ROM_Configuration Retrieve_CPU_Configuration Retrieve_Memory_Configuration Retrieve_Ethernet_Adapter_Configuration Retrieve_Hard_Disk_Configuration Retrieve_ESX_Hosts Retrieve_Clusters Retrieve_Datacenters Retrieve_Folders Retrieve_MOB_Reference_By_Display_Name Retrieve_Display_Name_By_MOB_Reference Retrieve_VM_File_Info Retrieve_Datastore_Virtual_Machines Retrieve_Available_Disks_For_Vmfs Retrieve_Host_CPU_Usage Retrieve_Host_Memory_Usage Retrieve_Resource_Pool_Children Retrieve_Host_Scsi_Topology Retrieve_Vmfs_Datastore_Storage_Controller Retrieve_Cluster_Virtual_Machines Retrieve_Selected_Cluster_Configuration_Properties
version The VMware Infrastructure Application version. The current supported version is v3.0

connection parameters [optional] The XML containing the metadata needed by the adapter to connect to the target.
Value takes the form:
<connection-parameters> <soap-url></soap-url> <transport></transport> <user-name></user-name> <password></password> </connection-parameters>

documentation.description: Find Items Finds one or more items within Virtual Infrastructure Client.
